    A

    AbstractNewsScene - Class in Unnamed Package

    applyHoverEffects(JButton) - Static method in class ButtonFactory
    Applies hover animations to a button When the mouse hovers over the button, it becomes slightly brighter When the mouse leaves, it returns to its original color

    Whether or not autoscrolling is currently happening
